effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of [poisoning]{mechanic:poison} the target with each hit.

This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of []{ability:shield-dust}.  This ability takes effect before []{ability:mummy}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of [poisoning]{mechanic:poison} target Pokémon upon contact.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
触るだけで　相手を
どくにすることがある。

May poison a target when the
Pokémon makes contact.

Può avvelenare il nemico al solo
contatto fisico.

Puede envenenar al objetivo con
solo tocarlo.

Kann das Ziel durch
bloßes Berühren vergiften.

Peut empoisonner l’ennemi par
simple contact.

접촉하기만 해도 상대를
독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

さわるだけで　あいてを
どくにすることがある。

May poison targets when a
Pokémon makes contact.

May poison targets when a
Pokémon makes contact.

Peut empoisonner l’ennemi
par simple contact.
